panels.description:
CPU Wait Time: Measures the time processes spend waiting for CPU resources, indicating potential contention.

Memory Wait Time: Tracks the time processes wait for memory availability, highlighting memory pressure.

IO Wait Time: Reflects the time processes spend waiting for I/O operations to complete, indicating disk performance issues.
panels.title: Resource Wait Time Overview | $Machine

panels.description: Total bytes transmitted over the network by host in 24 hours.
panels.title: Total N/W Bytes Transmitted Last (24h)
